title: BRIEF-Fortress REIT Says Special Ad HOC Subcommittee Completed Mandate, Dissolved By Board
text:
BRIEF-Fortress REIT Says Special Ad HOC Subcommittee Completed Mandate, Dissolved By Board

Stock Markets 16 minutes ago (Sep 16, 2019 14:51)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Fortress REIT Says Special Ad HOC Subcommittee Completed Mandate, Dissolved By Board Sept 16 (Reuters) - Fortress Reit Ltd : * FORTRESS REIT LTD - SPECIAL AD HOC SUBCOMMITTEE HAS COMPLETED ITS MANDATE AND BEEN DISSOLVED BY BOARD * FORTRESS REIT LTD - DISSOLUTION OF SPECIAL AD HOC SUBCOMMITTEE ESTABLISHED IN RESPONSE TO A DEMAND BY TEN INSTITUTIONAL STAKEHOLDERS

BRIEF-Fortress REIT Says Special Ad HOC Subcommittee Completed Mandate, Dissolved By Board
description: BRIEF-Fortress REIT Says Special Ad HOC Subcommittee Completed Mandate, Dissolved By Board
